description: Largest coefficient in expansion of Product (1+q^i+q^(2i)), i=1 to n.
links: Ray Chandler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2106 (terms < 10^1000)
S. R. Finch, Signum equations and extremal coefficients.
mathematica: nmax = 28; d = {1}; a1 = {};Do[  n0s = Table[0, {n}];  d = Join[d, n0s, n0s] + Join[n0s, d, n0s] + Join[n0s, n0s, d];  AppendTo[a1, Last[Union[d]]];  , {n, nmax}];a1 (* _Ray Chandler_, Mar 26 2014 *)
